org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.ms

Class MSConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.ms.MSConverter

  • public class MSConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an implementation of the Muller-Schupp determinization algorithm [David E. Muller, Paul E. Schupp: Simulating Alternating Tree Automata by Nondeterministic Automata: New Results and New Proofs of the Theorems of Rabin, McNaughton and Safra. Theoretical Computer Science. 141(1&2): 69-107. 1995].
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  MSConverter.NBW2DRWConverter
      This is the real implementation of the Muller-Schupp determinization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MSConverter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FSA NBW2DRW(FSA nbw)
      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Muller-Schupp construction with default options.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • MSConverter

        public MSConverter()

    • Method Detail

      • NBW2DRW

        public static FSA NBW2DRW(FSA nbw)
        Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Muller-Schupp construction with default options.
        Parameters:
        nbw - an NBW to be determinized
        Returns:
        an equivalent DRW
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nbw is not an NBW
